analyzed: gang 'di gzugs brnyan lta bu'i 'du byed de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //

analyzed: gang 'di sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //

analyzed: gang 'di sprul pa lta bu'i 'du byed de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //

analyzed: gang 'di sprul pa lta bu'i rnam par shes pa de @210b ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'o // med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because of being non-arisen, the bodhisattva is neither bound nor liberated.🔽Because of being nonexistent, the Buddha is neither bound nor liberated.

original: dben pa'i phyir sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because of being void, the Buddha is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because of being non-arisen, the Buddha is neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa,

original: de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o // ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: suchness is neither bound nor liberated;🔽unmistaken suchness is neither bound nor liberated;

original: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽chos nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o // chos nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: unchanging suchness is neither bound nor liberated;🔽the true nature of dharmas is neither bound nor liberated;

original: chos kyi dbyings kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽chos kyi gnas nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o // chos kyi gnas nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the dharma-constituent is neither bound nor liberated;🔽the establishment of dharmas is neither bound nor liberated;

original: chos skyon med pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the certification of dharmas is neither bound nor liberated;

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste /
translated: and the very limit of reality is neither bound nor liberated.

original: @218b tshe dang ldan pa gang po /🔽med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: @218b tshe dang ldan pa gang po / med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa,🔽suchness is neither bound nor liberated because it does not exist.

original: dben pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽ma skyes pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // ma skyes pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Suchness is neither bound nor liberated because it is void.🔽Suchness is neither bound nor liberated because it is not produced.

original: med pa'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Unmistaken suchness is neither bound nor liberated because it does not exist.

original: dben pa'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because of being void, the unmistaken real nature is not bound and is not liberated.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽med pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // med pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because of not being produced, the unmistaken real nature is not bound and is not liberated.🔽Because of not existing, the unaltered real nature is not bound and is not liberated.

original: dben pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because of being void, the unaltered real nature is not bound and is not liberated.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽med pa'i phyir chos nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // med pa'i phyir chos nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because of not being produced, the unaltered real nature is not bound and is not liberated.🔽Because of not existing, the real nature is not bound and is not liberated.

original: dben pa'i phyir chos nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir chos nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because of being void, the real nature is not bound and is not liberated.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir chos nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽med pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir chos nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // med pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because of not being produced, the real nature is not bound and is not liberated.🔽Because of not existing, the expanse of reality is not bound and is not liberated.

original: dben pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because of being void, the expanse of reality is not bound and is not liberated.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because of not being produced, the expanse of reality is not bound and is not liberated.

original: med pa'i phyir chos kyi gnas nyid ma bcings ma grol pa'o //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir chos kyi gnas nyid ma bcings ma grol pa'o //
translated: The establishment of dharmas is not bound and is not liberated because it does not exist.

original: dben pa'i phyir chos kyi gnas nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽ma skyes pa'i phyir chos kyi gnas nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir chos kyi gnas nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // ma skyes pa'i phyir chos kyi gnas nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The establishment of dharmas is not bound and is not liberated because it is isolated.🔽The establishment of dharmas is not bound and is not liberated because it is non-arisen.

original: med pa'i phyir chos skyon med pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir chos skyon med pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The faultlessness of dharmas is not bound and is not liberated because it does not exist.

original: dben pa'i phyir chos skyon med pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽ma skyes @219a *//
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir chos skyon med pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // ma skyes @219a *//
translated: The faultlessness of dharmas is not bound and is not liberated because it is isolated.

original: pa'i phyir chos skyon med pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: pa'i phyir chos skyon med pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The faultlessness of dharmas is not bound and is not liberated because it is non-arisen.

original: med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The reality limit is not bound and is not liberated because it does not exist.

original: dben pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o /
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o /
translated: The reality limit is not bound and is not liberated because it is isolated.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The reality limit is not bound and is not liberated because it is non-arisen.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa,

original: 'dus ma byas kyang ma bcings ma grol ba ste //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyang ma bcings ma grol ba ste //
translated: the unconditioned is also not bound and is not liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa,

original: med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽dben pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o // dben pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because it does not exist, the unconditioned is neither bound nor liberated.🔽Because it is isolated, the unconditioned is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because it is unborn, the unconditioned is neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste /
translated: this is the Dharma gateway called ‘neither bound nor liberated’ for bodhisattva great beings.

original: de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The perfection of moral discipline is neither bound nor liberated.🔽The perfection of patience is neither bound nor liberated.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The perfection of diligence is neither bound nor liberated.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is neither bound nor liberated.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is neither bound nor liberated.

original: nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Inner emptiness is not bound and is not freed.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Outer emptiness is not bound and is not freed.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is not bound and is not freed.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Emptiness of emptiness is not bound and is not freed.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Great emptiness is not bound and is not freed.

original: @219b don dam pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: @219b don dam pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Ultimate emptiness is not bound and is not freed.🔽Emptiness of compounded things is not bound and is not freed.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Emptiness of noncompounded things is not bound and is not freed.🔽Emptiness of what is beyond extremes is not bound and is not freed.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not bound and is not freed.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Emptiness of what is not to be discarded is not bound and is not freed.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Emptiness of inherent existence is not bound and is not freed.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Emptiness of all phenomena is not bound and is not freed.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is not bound and is not freed.🔽The emptiness of nonobservation is not bound and is not freed.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The emptiness of nonentities is not bound and is not freed.🔽The emptiness of essential nature is not bound and is not freed.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities is not bound and is not freed.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not bound and are not freed.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The right efforts are not bound and are not freed.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽dbang po rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o // dbang po rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The legs of miraculous power are not bound and are not freed.🔽The faculties are not bound and are not freed.

original: stobs rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The powers are not bound and are not freed.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The branches of awakening are not bound and are not freed.

original: lam rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: lam rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The path is not bound and is not freed.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The noble truths are not bound and are not freed.

original: bsam gtan rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the meditative stabilities are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: tshad med pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the immeasurable aspirations are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma bcings ma grol @220a *//
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma bcings ma grol @220a *//
translated: the formless absorptions are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: ba'o // rnam par thar pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ba'o // rnam par thar pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the aspects of liberation are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the aspects of absorption are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the emptiness aspect of liberation, the absence of attributes aspect of liberation, and the absence of expectancy aspect of liberation are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the extrasensory powers are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the meditative stabilities are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the fearlessnesses are neither fettered nor liberated,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges are neither fettered nor liberated,🔽and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are neither fettered nor liberated.

original: snying rje chen po ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: great compassion is neither bound nor liberated.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are neither bound nor liberated.

original: byang chub ma bcings ma grol ba'o /
analyzed: byang chub ma bcings ma grol ba'o /
translated: Awakening is neither bound nor liberated.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The knowledge of all phenomena is neither bound nor liberated.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The knowledge of the aspects of the path is neither bound nor liberated.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Omniscience is neither bound nor liberated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Bodhisattvas are neither bound nor liberated.

original: sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Buddhas are neither bound nor liberated.

original: de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Suchness is neither bound nor liberated.🔽Unmistaken suchness is neither bound nor liberated.

original: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽chos nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽chos kyi dbyings ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // chos nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o // chos kyi dbyings ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Unaltered suchness is neither bound nor liberated.🔽The true nature of dharmas is neither bound nor liberated.🔽The dharmadhātu is neither bound nor liberated.

original: chos kyi gnas nyid ma bcings ma grol @220b ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi gnas nyid ma bcings ma grol @220b ba'o //
translated: The establishment of dharmas is neither bound nor liberated.

original: chos skyon med pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o /
analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o /
translated: The Dharma is not bound and is not freed.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o /
translated: The very limit of reality is not bound and is not freed.

original: 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba ste //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba ste //
translated: The unconditioned is not bound and is not freed.

original: de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /
analyzed: de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /
translated: They stand in the unconditioned perfection of generosity.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /
translated: They stand in the unconditioned perfection of ethical discipline.🔽They stand in the unconditioned perfection of patience.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /
translated: They stand in the unconditioned perfection of perseverance.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /
translated: They stand in the unconditioned perfection of concentration.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i nang stong pa nyid la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i phyi stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i nang stong pa nyid la gnas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i phyi stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They stand in the unconditioned perfection of wisdom.🔽They stand in the unconditioned emptiness of internal phenomena.🔽They stand in the unconditioned emptiness of external phenomena.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They stand in the unconditioned emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of emptiness, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i chen po stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i chen po stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of the great, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of the ultimate, which is not bound and not freed.🔽They abide in the emptiness of the conditioned, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of the unconditioned, which is not bound and not freed.🔽They abide in the emptiness of beyond extremes, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of no beginning and no end, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of no rejection, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of nature, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma @221a *// bcings ma grol ba'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma @221a *// bcings ma grol ba'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of all phenomena, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of its own mark, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of nonapprehending, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i dngo sa po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i dngo sa po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of the nonexistence of things, which is not bound and not freed.🔽They abide in the emptiness of essential nature, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas /
translated: They abide in the applications of mindfulness, which are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas /
translated: They abide in the right efforts, which are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i dbang po rnams la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i dbang po rnams la gnas /
translated: They abide in the legs of miraculous power, which are not bound and not freed.🔽They abide in the faculties, which are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i stobs rnams la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i stobs rnams la gnas /
translated: They abide in the powers, which are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas /
translated: They abide in the branches of awakening, which are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas /
translated: They abide in the noble eightfold path, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas /
translated: They abide in the noble truths that are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i bsam gtan rnams la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i bsam gtan rnams la gnas /
translated: They abide in the concentrations that are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshad med pa rnams la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshad med pa rnams la gnas /
translated: They abide in the immeasurables that are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas /
translated: They abide in the formless absorptions that are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas /
translated: They abide in the eight aspects of liberation that are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la @221b gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la @221b gnas /
translated: They abide in the nine serial steps of meditative absorption that are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation and that are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas /
translated: They abide in the clairvoyances that are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs kyi sgo rnams la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs kyi sgo rnams la gnas /
translated: They abide in the meditative stabilities that are not bound and not freed.🔽They abide in the gateways to the dhāraṇīs that are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas /
translated: They abide in the ten powers of the tathāgatas, which are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas /
translated: They abide in the four fearlessnesses of the tathāgatas, which are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas /
translated: They abide in the four detailed and thorough knowledges, which are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i snying rje chen po la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i snying rje chen po la gnas /
translated: They abide in great compassion, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas /
translated: They abide in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, which are not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i byang chub la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i byang chub la gnas /
translated: They abide in awakening, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i thams cad shes pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i thams cad shes pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the knowledge of all aspects, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the knowledge of paths, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin nyid la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin nyid la gnas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the knowledge of all bases, which is not bound and not freed.🔽They abide in suchness, which is not bound and not freed.🔽They abide in unmistaken suchness, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in unaltered suchness, which is not bound and not freed.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nyid la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nyid la gnas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas /
translated: He abides in the reality that is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the realm of phenomena that is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma byas la @222a *//
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas / ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma byas la @222a *//
translated: He abides in the faultless nature of phenomena that is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the limit of reality that is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned that is neither bound nor liberated.

original: gnas te / ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: gnas te / ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: He brings to maturity beings who are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: He purifies the buddhafield that is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do //
translated: He serves the blessed buddhas who are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nyan to //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nyan to //
translated: He listens to the Dharma that is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated is never separate from the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, who are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated is never separate from the superknowledges, which are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i mig lnga dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i mig lnga dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated is never separate from the five eyes, which are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzungs rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzungs rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated is never separate from the dhāraṇīs, which are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated is never separate from the meditative stabilities, which are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated accomplishes the knowledge of path aspects, which is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated will fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect awakening that is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i @222b chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i @222b chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated will turn the wheel of the Dharma that is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god par 'gyur te /
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated will establish sentient beings that are neither bound nor liberated in the three vehicles.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: in this way, bodhisattva great beings who are neither bound nor liberated

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po ma bcings ma grol ba med pa dang / dben pa dang / skye ba med pa'i bar bzung zhing /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po ma bcings ma grol ba med pa dang / dben pa dang / skye ba med pa'i bar bzung zhing /
translated: take hold of the six perfections that are neither bound nor liberated, that are non-existent, secluded, and non-arisen,

original: chos thams cad khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad khong du chud par byed do //
translated: and they comprehend all phenomena.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba /
translated: in this way, bodhisattva great beings who are neither bound nor liberated

original: theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that they have donned the armor of the Great Vehicle.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags /
translated: what is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings?

original: bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba lags /
translated: Lord, by how much should the bodhisattva great beings be known to have set out in the Great Vehicle?

original: theg pa de ni gang nas byung ba lags /
analyzed: theg pa de ni gang nas byung ba lags /
translated: Where does that vehicle come from?

original: theg pa de ni gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: theg pa de ni gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: Where will that vehicle stand?

original: theg pa des ni su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur /🔽de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: theg pa des ni su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Who will go forth on that vehicle?”🔽The Lord having been asked that, said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / gang khyod de skad du /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang khyod de skad du /
translated: “Subhūti, you have asked

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po gang zhes zer ba ni /🔽rab 'byor / pha rol @223a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po gang zhes zer ba ni / rab 'byor / pha rol @223a *//
translated: “What is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings?”

original: tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste /
analyzed: tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste /
translated: Subhūti, the six perfections are the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas don du gnyer ba rnams la 'di ltar phyi nang gi dngo sa po'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas don du gnyer ba rnams la 'di ltar phyi nang gi dngo sa po'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects give away the gift of inner and outer things to those who are in need.

original: de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: Moreover, it is shared with all sentient beings,🔽and is dedicated to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening in a way that is not observed.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of giving.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
translated: what is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of morality?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, with the thought that is the union of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas la /
analyzed: bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas la /
translated: take up and maintain the ten wholesome actions,

original: sems @223b can pha rol kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rab tu dgod par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o //
analyzed: sems @223b can pha rol kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rab tu dgod par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of morality of bodhisattva great beings without loss.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
translated: what is the perfection of patience of bodhisattva great beings?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

analyzed: bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson pa mi 'dor zhing /

analyzed: bdag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med par chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par byed cing /

analyzed: sems can rnams kyang chos @224b thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa dang / chos thams cad kyis rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par skul zhing gzhog pa dang / rab tu 'god par byed pa 'di ni /

translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, the Great Vehicle of the Bodhisattva, the great being, is as follows:🔽the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the great emptiness, the ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-discarded, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de /

original: 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te /
analyzed: 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te /
translated: The so-called conditioned is the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is impermanent and does not perish,

original: 'dod pa'i khams 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the desire realm is empty of the desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo /
translated: The form realm is empty of the form realm.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The formless realm is empty of the formless realm.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the emptiness of the unconditioned?

original: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas zhes bya ste /
translated: The so-called unconditioned is that which has no arising, no cessation, and no abiding.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is impermanent and does not perish,

original: 'dus ma byas de ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas de ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo //
translated: the unconditioned is empty of the unconditioned.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is the nature of the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of beyond extremes?”

original: gang la mtha' mi @226b dmigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: gang la mtha' mi @226b dmigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa ste /
translated: That which is beyond extremes is not observed as an extreme.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is neither permanent nor destroyed,

original: mtha' las 'das pa mtha' las 'das pas stong ngo //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa mtha' las 'das pas stong ngo //
translated: beyond extremes is empty of beyond extremes.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is the nature of beyond extremes.

original: 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of beyond extremes.

original: de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of no beginning and end?”

original: gang la thog ma mi dmigs shing /🔽tha ma yang mi dmigs pa de la 'gro ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: gang la thog ma mi dmigs shing / tha ma yang mi dmigs pa de la 'gro ba mi dmigs /
translated: That which is not observed as a beginning

original: 'ong ba mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'ong ba mi dmigs te /
translated: and is not observed as an end is not observed as going and not observed as coming.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is neither permanent nor destroyed,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa thog ma dang tha ma med pas stong ngo //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa thog ma dang tha ma med pas stong ngo //
translated: that which has no beginning and end is empty of that which has no beginning and end.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is the nature of that which has no beginning and end.

original: 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called “emptiness of no beginning or end.”

original: de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of non-apprehension?”

original: gang la gang yang dor ba med pa ste /
analyzed: gang la gang yang dor ba med pa ste /
translated: There is nothing that is apprehended.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is neither permanent nor destroyed,

original: dor ba med pa dor ba med pas stong ste /
analyzed: dor ba med pa dor ba med pas stong ste /
translated: non-apprehension is empty of non-apprehension.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called “the emptiness of non-apprehension.”

original: de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang zhe na /🔽'dus byas sam /
analyzed: de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang zhe na / 'dus byas sam /
translated: “What is the emptiness of nature?”

original: 'dus ma byas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyang rung ste /
translated: Whether conditioned or unconditioned,

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni /
translated: all dharmas have a nature

original: nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas /
analyzed: nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas /
translated: that has not been made by the śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas /
translated: not made by the pratyekabuddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma byas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma byas /
translated: not made by the bodhisattvas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas te /
translated: and not made by the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is impermanent and indestructible,

original: rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: nature is empty of nature.

original: @227a *// de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: @227a *// de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of nature.

original: de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the emptiness of all phenomena?

original: chos thams cad ces bya ba ni /🔽gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad ces bya ba ni / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang /
translated: All phenomena are🔽form, feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness; the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty; forms, sounds, smells, tastes, tactile objects, and mental objects;

original: ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
analyzed: ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
translated: the eye consciousness, ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, and mental consciousness;

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact,🔽the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact,🔽the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact,🔽the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
translated: and the feeling that arises from the condition of mind contact,🔽and the phenomena of form,🔽the phenomena of no form,🔽the conditioned phenomena,

original: gzugs yod pa'i chos dang / gzugs med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos te /
analyzed: gzugs yod pa'i chos dang / gzugs med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos te /
translated: and the unconditioned phenomena.

original: 'di dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o //
translated: These are called all phenomena.

original: de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i @227b phyir /
analyzed: de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i @227b phyir /
translated: Because they are impermanent and do not perish,

original: chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo //
translated: All phenomena are empty of all phenomena.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of defining characteristics?

original: gzugs ni 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: gzugs ni 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of form is to be broken.

original: tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of feeling is experience.

original: 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of perception is to apprehend.

original: 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of formation is to form.

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of consciousness is to be aware.

original: phung po ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid /
analyzed: phung po ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of the aggregates is suffering.

original: khams ni gdug pa'i mtshan nyid /🔽skye mched ni skye ba'i sgo'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: khams ni gdug pa'i mtshan nyid / skye mched ni skye ba'i sgo'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of the elements is to be poisonous.🔽The defining characteristic of the sense sources is to be doors of arising.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of dependent origination is to be a coming together.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The defining characteristic of the perfection of generosity is to let go.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gdung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gdung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The perfection of morality has the characteristic of being without torment.🔽The perfection of patience has the characteristic of being without anger.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The perfection of effort has the characteristic of being invincible.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yang dag par 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yang dag par 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The perfection of meditation has the characteristic of being well-collected.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The perfection of wisdom has the characteristic of being without attachment.

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The four concentrations, the four immeasurables, and the formless absorptions have the characteristic of being without disturbance.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid /🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid /🔽rnam par thar @228a *//
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid / rnam par thar @228a *//
translated: The thirty-seven factors of enlightenment have the characteristic of arising.🔽The emptiness gate of liberation has the characteristic of being void.

original: pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The signless gate of liberation has the characteristic of being peaceful.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The gate of liberation of wishlessness has the characteristic of eliminating suffering.

original: rnam par grol ba ni rnam par 'grel ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba ni rnam par 'grel ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Liberation has the characteristic of being a release.

original: stobs rnams ni shin tu rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: stobs rnams ni shin tu rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The powers have the characteristic of being very penetrating.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni shin tu brtan pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni shin tu brtan pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The fearlessnesses have the characteristic of being very stable.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mi chod pa'i mtshan nyid /🔽byams pa chen po ni phan pa bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mi chod pa'i mtshan nyid / byams pa chen po ni phan pa bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The correct understandings have the characteristic of being unbreakable.🔽Great love has the characteristic of accomplishing benefit.

original: snying rje chen po ni yongs su skyob pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni yongs su skyob pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Great compassion has the characteristic of being a complete protection.

original: dga' ba chen po ni rang tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: dga' ba chen po ni rang tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Great joy has the characteristic of being a great delight.

original: btang snyoms chen po ni 'dre ba med pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: btang snyoms chen po ni 'dre ba med pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Great equanimity has the characteristic of being without mixing.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi 'phrogs pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi 'phrogs pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The eighteen unshared qualities of the Buddha have the characteristic of being unstealable.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: The wisdom of omniscience has the characteristic of being direct perception.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is neither impermanent nor destroyed.

original: 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i rang rang gi mtshan nyid de dag gis chos de dag thams cad stong ste /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i rang rang gi mtshan nyid de dag gis chos de dag thams cad stong ste /
translated: The characteristics of conditioned phenomena and the characteristics of unconditioned phenomena are empty of those characteristics.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de dag gi rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de dag gi rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of non-apprehension?

original: gang la 'das pa mi dmigs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa mi dmigs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gnas mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: gang la 'das pa mi dmigs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa mi dmigs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gnas mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: The past is not apprehended, the future is not apprehended, and the present is not apprehended as a location.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are impermanent and do not disintegrate,

original: mi dmigs pa mi dmigs @228b pas stong ngo //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa mi dmigs @228b pas stong ngo //
translated: non-apprehension is empty of non-apprehension.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: de la dngo sa po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dngo sa po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of essential nature?

original: chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: Because all dharmas are dependently arisen.

original: 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: The compounded is empty of the compounded.

original: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is impermanent and does not perish.

original: 'dus pa 'dus pas stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus pa 'dus pas stong ngo //
translated: The compounded is empty of the compounded.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni dngo sa po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dngo sa po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of the nonexistence of things.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang dngo sa po ni dngos pos stong ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang dngo sa po ni dngos pos stong ngo //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, a thing is empty of a thing.

original: dngos po med pa ni dngo sa po med pas stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni dngo sa po med pas stong ngo //
translated: A nonthing is empty of a nonthing.

original: rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: A nature is empty of a nature.

original: gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos stong ngo //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos stong ngo //
translated: Another thing is empty of another thing.

original: de la dngos po dngos po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dngos po dngos po zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a thing called a thing?

original: phung po lnga po ste /
analyzed: phung po lnga po ste /
translated: The five aggregates.

original: phung po de dag kyang phung po rnams kyis stong pas /
analyzed: phung po de dag kyang phung po rnams kyis stong pas /
translated: And those aggregates are empty of the aggregates.

original: de ltar na dngos po dngos pos stong ngo //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po dngos pos stong ngo //
translated: Thus a thing is empty of a thing.

original: ji ltar na dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong zhe na /
translated: How is a nonthing empty of a nonthing?

original: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas te /
translated: The so-called non-entity is the unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas de'ang 'dus ma byas kyis stong pas /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas de'ang 'dus ma byas kyis stong pas /
translated: That unconditioned is empty of the unconditioned.

original: de ltar na dngos po med pa dngo sa po med pas stong ngo //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po med pa dngo sa po med pas stong ngo //
translated: Thus, the non-entity is empty of the non-entity.

original: ji ltar na rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong zhe na /
translated: How is the intrinsic nature empty of the intrinsic nature?

original: rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid ma nor ba ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid ma nor ba ste /
translated: The so-called intrinsic nature is the unerring essence.

original: de la stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes pas ma byas /
analyzed: de la stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes pas ma byas /
translated: That which is emptiness in that is not made by knowledge,

original: mthong bas ma byas te /
analyzed: mthong bas ma byas te /
translated: not made by seeing,

original: 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: This is the emptiness of the intrinsic nature.

original: de la gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the emptiness of other entities?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /🔽@229a *// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /🔽@229a *// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
translated: Whether the Tathāgatas arise or not,

original: chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste /🔽de ltar chos de dag gi gzhan gyi stong pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste / de ltar chos de dag gi gzhan gyi stong pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the reality of phenomena, the true nature of phenomena, the expanse of reality, the perfection of phenomena, thusness, unaltered thusness, the authentic thusness, the true limit, and the inconceivable basic nature—🔽the emptiness of that which is other

original: gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya ste /
translated: is called the emptiness of the other.🔽Subhūti, this is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.🔽The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines🔽The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines🔽The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o ////
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o ////
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines🔽The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines🔽The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa // bam po re gsum pa //
