original: dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the hero’s progress meditative stabilization, the jewel seal meditative stabilization, the lion’s play meditative stabilization, the good moon meditative stabilization,

original: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the glorious moon banner meditative stabilization, the exalted above all meditative stabilization, the seal of all phenomena meditative stabilization, the looking at the crown meditative stabilization,

original: chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting @229b nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting @229b nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called definite in the dharmadhatu, the samadhi called glorious banner of certainty, the samadhi called vajra, the samadhi called mudra of engaging in all dharmas,

original: ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal pos bde bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal pos bde bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called abiding like a king in samadhi, the samadhi called abiding in supreme bliss, the samadhi called entering bliss through the king of samadhis,

original: 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the radiance samādhi, the nondelusion samādhi, the nondelusion radiating light samādhi, the diligence power samādhi,

translated: the arrayed army samādhi, the exalted samādhi, the definitive word engagement samādhi, the correct engagement with the etymology samādhi,

original: phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called Observing All Directions, the samādhi called Holding the Seal, the samādhi called Unfailing, the samādhi called the Seal of the Ocean of the True Gathering of All Dharmas,

original: rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khor gsum @230a *//
analyzed: rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khor gsum @230a *//
translated: the samādhi called the King’s Seal, the samādhi called Filling the Expanse of Space, the samādhi called the Vajra Maṇḍala, the samādhi called the Three Circles,

original: yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /🔽seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par skyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par glal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par skyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par glal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the completely pure meditative stabilization, the victory banner’s crest ornament meditative stabilization, the sense-power glory meditative stabilization, the continuous subsequent meditative stabilization,🔽the lion’s yawn meditative stabilization, the lion’s protection meditative stabilization, the lion’s stretch meditative stabilization, the criss-cross meditative stabilization,

original: chags pa dang thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: chags pa dang thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the unattached and unobstructed meditative stabilization, the afflictive emotions abandonment meditative stabilization, the illuminating meditative stabilization, the non-quest meditative stabilization,

original: gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud bzhi 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud bzhi 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Non-abiding in the Abodes, the samadhi called No-mind, the samadhi called Subduing the Four Maras, the samadhi called Stainless Lamp,

original: 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Infinite Light, the samadhi called Light-maker, the samadhi called Universal Illumination, the samadhi called Holy Purity, the samadhi called Stainless Light,

original: dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i @230b ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

translated: the samādhi called Delightful, the samādhi called Lightning Lamp, the samādhi called Inexhaustible, the samādhi called Unconquerable, the samādhi called Brilliant,

original: zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called Free from Exhaustion, the samādhi called Unwavering, the samādhi called Pacifying, the samādhi called Non-destruction, the samādhi called Sun Lamp,

original: zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mig yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

translated: the moon lamp meditative stabilization, the light maker meditative stabilization, the function performer meditative stabilization, the wisdom glory meditative stabilization, the vajra-like meditative stabilization,

original: sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

translated: the samādhi called abiding mind, the samādhi called universal illumination, the samādhi called well-established, the samādhi called jewel limit, the samādhi called seal of the sublime Dharma,

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i @231a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i @231a *//
translated: the samādhi called sameness of all phenomena, the samādhi called abandoning joy, the samādhi called exalted by Dharma, the samādhi called filled with the exalted by Dharma,

original: ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called Jewel, the samādhi called Abandoning Disturbance, the samādhi called Scattering, the samādhi called Distinguishing the Words of All Dharmas,

original: rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

analyzed: 'di ni ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gnas dmigs pa med pa ste /

original: 'di ni gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: 'di ni rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /

analyzed: 'di ni spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: gang la yang 'dzin pa med pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni spyod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: 'di @243b ni brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la rin chen snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

analyzed: 'gyur ba dang 'jigs pa med cing yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i rin chen rgyud dam pa sgrub pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni rin chen snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la chos thams cad la chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

original: chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos gang la'ang chags pa med pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos gang la'ang chags pa med pa ste /

original: 'di ni chos thams cad la chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni chos thams cad la chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skyob pa ste /
translated: it protects from all worldly suffering.

original: 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samadhi called protecting all worlds.

original: de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called equality of meditative absorption?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in this samādhi,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: one does not observe any disturbance in any meditative absorption,

original: rtse gcig kyang mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: rtse gcig kyang mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: nor does one observe any single-pointedness.

original: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called equality of meditative absorption.

original: de la rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called possessing the mode of non-dust and non-separation from dust?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in this samādhi,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad rdul can dang rdul dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad rdul can dang rdul dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ste /
translated: one realizes the equality of all meditative absorptions and all phenomena, which are neither dusty nor dust-free.

original: 'di ni rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called possessing the mode of non-dust and non-separation from dust.

original: de la nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called arriving at the absence of afflictions?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Standing in this samādhi,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyon mongs pa med par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyon mongs pa med par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: all samādhis become free of defilements.

original: 'di ni nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting @246b nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting @246b nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called the right application free of defilements.

original: de la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called the right application of all that is with defilements to that which is without defilements?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Standing in this samādhi,

original: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: all that is with defilements is applied to that which is without defilements.

original: 'di ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called the right application of all that is with defilements to that which is without defilements.

original: de la gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called the absence of a reference point?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Standing in this samādhi,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: The foundation of all samādhis is not observed.

original: 'di ni gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called diligence in the nonapprehending object.🔽“What is the samādhi called abiding in suchness?

original: de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /
analyzed: de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in this samādhi,🔽one does not turn back from the suchness of all samādhis.🔽This is the samādhi called abiding in suchness.

original: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called free of mind?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in this samādhi,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa ste /🔽'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa ste / 'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /
translated: one does not turn back from the suchness of all samādhis.

original: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called free of mind.

original: de la snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called arising from the vessel?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in this samādhi,

original: mnyam par bzhag pa'i mthus yon tan mang po bskyed de /
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag pa'i mthus yon tan mang po bskyed de /
translated: through the power of equipoise one generates many good qualities.

original: ji ltar lha dag bsod nams kyi mthus kha zas mang po dag snod las rang 'byung bar 'gyur ba lta bu ste /
analyzed: ji ltar lha dag bsod nams kyi mthus kha zas mang po dag snod las rang 'byung bar 'gyur ba lta bu ste /
translated: Just as the gods, through the power of their merit, have many kinds of food arise from their vessels,

original: 'di ni snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the meditative stabilization called Self-Arisen from a Receptacle.

original: de la nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe @247a *//
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe @247a *//
translated: “What is the meditative stabilization called Burning All Afflictions?

original: na / ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: na / ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tha ba ma lus par sreg pa ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tha ba ma lus par sreg pa ste /
translated: all the afflictions are completely burned away.

original: 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the meditative stabilization called Burning All Afflictions.

original: de la ye shes chen po sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ye shes chen po sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the meditative stabilization called Lamp of Great Gnosis?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which

original: ye shes kyi 'od kyis thams cad snang bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'od kyis thams cad snang bar byed pa ste /
translated: the light of gnosis illuminates everything.

original: 'di ni ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the meditative stabilization called Lamp of Gnosis.

original: de la stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the meditative stabilization called Source of the Ten Powers?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the swift perfection of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: 'di ni stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: “This is the samādhi called the source of the ten powers.

original: de la sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called the opening of the threshold?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in that samādhi,

original: sems can rnams kyi don du dam pa'i chos kyi sgo phye bas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po las myur du sgrol ba ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don du dam pa'i chos kyi sgo phye bas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po las myur du sgrol ba ste /
translated: for the sake of beings, the threshold of the Dharma is opened, and they are quickly liberated from the great suffering of saṃsāra.

original: 'di ni sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: “This is the samādhi called the opening of the threshold.

original: de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called the removal of the faults of the body?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in that samādhi,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi lus mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi lus mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: the body of all samādhis is not apprehended.

original: 'di ni lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: “This is the samādhi called the removal of the faults of the body.

original: de la ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called the space-like destruction of the faults of speech?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in this samādhi,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: the activity of speech of all samādhis is non-apprehensible.

original: 'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par @247b 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par @247b 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called the space-like destruction of the faults of speech.

original: de la ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called the elimination of the faults of speech?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: Abiding in this samādhi, the activity of speech of all samādhis is non-apprehensible.

original: 'di ni ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called the elimination of the faults of speech.

original: de la yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called the elimination of the faults of mind?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yid kyi las mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yid kyi las mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: Abiding in that meditative stabilization, he does not apprehend the mental activity of any meditative stabilization.

original: 'di ni yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the meditative stabilization called “removing mental faults.”

original: de la kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the meditative stabilization called ‘conception’?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in that meditative stabilization,

original: sems can rnams kyi dbang po'i bye brag la kun tu rtog cing grol bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi dbang po'i bye brag la kun tu rtog cing grol bar byed pa ste /
translated: he conceives of the specific faculties of sentient beings and liberates them.

original: 'di ni kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the meditative stabilization called ‘conception.’

original: de la nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the meditative stabilization called ‘like space’?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in that meditative stabilization,

original: ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin du sems can rnams la snyoms par phan 'dogs pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin du sems can rnams la snyoms par phan 'dogs pa ste /
translated: he benefits sentient beings impartially, like space.

original: 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the meditative stabilization called ‘like space.’

original: de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the meditative stabilization called ‘liberation through freedom from attachment like space’?

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in that meditative stabilization,

original: chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa 'thob pa ste /
translated: all phenomena are liberated through freedom from attachment like space and are unstained.

original: 'di ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te /🔽rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes @248a *//
analyzed: 'di ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te / rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes @248a *//
translated: This is the meditative stabilization called ‘liberation through freedom from attachment like space.’

original: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: Subhūti, this is the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: le'u dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u dgu pa'o ////
translated: This was the ninth chapter, “Great Vehicle,” of “The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines.”

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, moreover, the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings is as follows:

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ste /
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o //
analyzed: lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o //
translated: The application of mindfulness to the body, the application of mindfulness to feelings, the application of mindfulness to mind, and the application of mindfulness to dharmas.

original: de la lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the application of mindfulness to the body?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /🔽brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, with regard to the internal body, watch the body, but not apprehending anything,

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: with perseverance, with mindfulness, and with introspection,

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
translated: they clear away worldly desire and displeasure,

original: rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: and they do not conceptualize the concepts associated with the body.

original: phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: With regard to the external body, they watch the body, but not apprehending anything,

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: with perseverance, with mindfulness, and with introspection,

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
translated: They clear away worldly attachment and unhappiness.

original: rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They engage in conduct without conceptualizing the concepts associated with the body.

original: phyi nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: phyi nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: They observe the body in the outer and inner body without apprehending anything.

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /🔽dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa / dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: They are diligent, alert, and mindful.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
translated: They clear away worldly attachment and unhappiness.

original: rnam par @248b spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par @248b spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They engage in conduct without conceptualizing the concepts associated with the body.

original: nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /
translated: They observe feelings in inner feelings without apprehending anything.

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /🔽dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa / dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: They are diligent, alert, and mindful.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
translated: They clear away worldly attachment and unhappiness.

original: rnam par spyod kyang tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par spyod kyang tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /

original: phyi'i tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: phyi'i tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /
translated: “They may observe sensations in external phenomena without apprehending anything.

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /🔽dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa / dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: They may be diligent, alert, and mindful,

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /

original: tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: but they do not engage in concepts associated with sensations.

original: phyi nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: phyi nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /
translated: “They may observe sensations in both external and internal phenomena without apprehending anything.

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /🔽dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa / dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: They may be diligent, alert, and mindful,

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
translated: and they may engage in conduct while dispelling worldly attachment and unhappiness,

original: tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: but they do not engage in concepts associated with sensations.”

original: nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /🔽brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: They are diligent, mindful, and endowed with alertness.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /

analyzed: rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They engage in conduct but do not conceptualize the concepts that are associated with the mind.

original: phyi'i sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta @249a *//
analyzed: phyi'i sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta @249a *//
translated: They observe the external mind without observing anything.

original: zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: They are diligent, mindful, and endowed with alertness.

original: dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
translated: They are mindful and eliminate worldly attachment and unhappiness.

original: sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /

original: phyi nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: phyi nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: The diligent person is endowed with alertness.🔽

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: They are diligent, attentive, and mindful.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
translated: They are free from worldly attachment and unhappiness.

original: rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They are free from conceptual thoughts.

original: nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /🔽brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: They observe inner phenomena in accordance with the Dharma, without apprehending anything.

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: They are diligent, attentive, and mindful.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
translated: They are free from worldly attachment and unhappiness.

original: chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: They are free from conceptual thoughts.

original: phyi'i chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /🔽brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: phyi'i chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: They observe outer phenomena in accordance with the Dharma, without apprehending anything.

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: They are diligent, attentive, and mindful.🔽They are free from worldly attachment and unhappiness.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
translated: They are free from worldly covetousness and depression,

original: rnam par spyod kyang chos dang ldan pa rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par spyod kyang chos dang ldan pa rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: and though they practice, they do not conceptualize in a way that accords with the conceptualizations.

original: phyi nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: phyi nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: They observe phenomena internally and externally, and in doing so they do not observe phenomena.

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /🔽dran pa dang @249b ldan pas /🔽'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa / dran pa dang @249b ldan pas / 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /
translated: They are diligent, mindful, and aware.🔽They are free from worldly covetousness and depression,

original: chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: and though they practice, they do not conceptualize in a way that accords with the conceptualizations.

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /🔽rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings practice observing the body in and of itself?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro na 'gro'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro na 'gro'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings know, ‘I am going.’

original: 'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //🔽'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so // 'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: if standing, he knows he is standing;🔽if sitting, he knows he is sitting;

original: nyal na nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nyal na nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: if lying down, he knows he is lying down.

original: de'i lus nyams bde ba dang nyams mi bde'ang rung ste /
analyzed: de'i lus nyams bde ba dang nyams mi bde'ang rung ste /
translated: Whether his body is at ease or in pain,

original: ji lta ji ltar gnas pa /
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar gnas pa /
translated: whatever the case,

original: de lta de ltar nges par rab tu shes te /
analyzed: de lta de ltar nges par rab tu shes te /
translated: he knows it just as it is.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /🔽brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings, with regard to their own bodies, watch their bodies, without apprehending anything.

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: They are diligent, mindful, and aware,

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
translated: and they practice, having cleared away worldly desire and sorrow.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings

original: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do //
translated: watch their bodies, without apprehending anything.

original: de 'gro'am 'ong yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
analyzed: de 'gro'am 'ong yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
translated: Whether going or coming, they practice with vigilance.

original: lta 'am rnam par lta'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
analyzed: lta 'am rnam par lta'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
translated: Whether looking straight ahead or looking to the side, they practice with vigilance.

original: bskum mam brkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
analyzed: bskum mam brkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
translated: Whether bending or stretching, they practice with vigilance.

original: sbyar ma dang lhung bzed 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin @250a *//🔽du spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sbyar ma dang lhung bzed 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin @250a *// du spyod pa yin /
translated: Whether carrying their robes and alms bowl or using them, they practice with vigilance.

original: zos pa dang 'chos pa dang 'thungs pa dang / myangs pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
analyzed: zos pa dang 'chos pa dang 'thungs pa dang / myangs pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
translated: Whether eating, consuming, or tasting, they practice with vigilance.

original: nyal ba dang gnyid kyi mya myo bsal ba la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
analyzed: nyal ba dang gnyid kyi mya myo bsal ba la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
translated: Whether lying down or waking up from sleep, they practice with vigilance.

original: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
translated: Whether going or coming, they practice with vigilance.

original: 'greng ba dang 'dug pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /🔽gnyid kyis log gam /
analyzed: 'greng ba dang 'dug pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin / gnyid kyis log gam /
translated: Whether standing or sitting, they practice with vigilance.

original: ma log na'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /🔽smra ba dang mi smra na'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
analyzed: ma log na'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin / smra ba dang mi smra na'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin /
translated: Whether falling asleep or not, they practice with vigilance.🔽Whether speaking or silent, they practice with vigilance.

original: nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te /
analyzed: nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te /
translated: Whether resting in equipoise or not, they practice with vigilance.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, do bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: observe the internal body as a body, but do not apprehend anything.

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: They are diligent, mindful, and aware,

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
translated: and they practice while clearing away worldly desire and unhappiness.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu na'ang /
analyzed: dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu na'ang /
translated: are mindful when they breathe in,

original: dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: they are fully aware that they are breathing in.

original: dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu na'ang /
analyzed: dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu na'ang /

original: dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: and they are fully aware that they are breathing out.

original: dbugs nang du ring du rgyu na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs nang du ring du rgyu na'ang /

original: dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: he knows “the breath goes in long.”

original: dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na'ang /
translated: When the breath goes out long,

original: dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes @250b bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes @250b bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: he knows “the breath goes out long.”

original: dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu na'ang /
translated: When the breath goes in short,

original: dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: he knows “the breath goes in short.”

original: dbugs phyir thung ngu rgyu na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs phyir thung ngu rgyu na'ang /
translated: When the breath goes out short,

original: phyir dbugs thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: phyir dbugs thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
translated: he knows “the breath goes out short.”

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste / dper na / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba'am /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:🔽For example, a skilled turner

original: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i mchan bu mkhas pa ni /🔽ring du bskor na ring du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i mchan bu mkhas pa ni / ring du bskor na ring du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: or a skilled turner’s apprentice🔽when turning a long circle knows “a long circle is being turned,”

original: thung ngu bskor na thung ngu bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: thung ngu bskor na thung ngu bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: and when turning a short circle knows “a short circle is being turned.”

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: dran par dbugs nang du brgyus na'ang /
analyzed: dran par dbugs nang du brgyus na'ang /
translated: when they breathe in with mindfulness,

original: dran par dbugs nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dran par dbugs nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: they know that they are breathing in with mindfulness.

original: dran par dbugs phyir brgyus na'ang /
analyzed: dran par dbugs phyir brgyus na'ang /
translated: When they breathe out with mindfulness,

original: dran par dbugs phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dran par dbugs phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: they know that they are breathing out with mindfulness.

original: dbugs ring du nang du brgyus na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs ring du nang du brgyus na'ang /
translated: When they breathe in long,

original: dbugs ring du nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbugs ring du nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: they know that they are breathing in long.

original: dbugs ring du phyir brgyus na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs ring du phyir brgyus na'ang /
translated: When they breathe out long,

original: dbugs ring du phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbugs ring du phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: they know that they are breathing out long.

original: dbugs thung ngu nang du brgyus na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs thung ngu nang du brgyus na'ang /
translated: When they breathe in short,

original: dbugs thung ngu nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbugs thung ngu nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: they know that they are breathing in short.

original: dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus na'ang /
analyzed: dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus na'ang /
translated: When they breathe out short,🔽they know that they are breathing out short.

original: dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
translated: and when he exhales a long breath, he is perfectly aware that he is exhaling a long breath; and when he inhales a short breath, he is perfectly aware that he is inhaling a short breath, and when he exhales a short breath, he is perfectly aware that he is exhaling a short breath.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, in this way🔽the bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus @251a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus @251a *//
translated: who practices the perfection of wisdom🔽observes the internal body as a body,

original: kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: kyi rjes su lta zhing /
translated: but does not apprehend anything.

original: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa ngan pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa ngan pa dang ldan pas /
translated: He is diligent, mindful, and fully aware,

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
translated: and he abandons worldly desire and depression.🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, when the bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do //
translated: who practices the perfection of wisdom🔽examines the body as a body, he correctly discerns that in this body there is the earth element,

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste /
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste /
translated: there is the water element, there is the fire element, and there is the wind element.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / ba lang gi shen pa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste / dper na / ba lang gi shen pa'am /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:🔽for example, a skilled butcher

original: ba lang gi shen pa'i mchan bu mkhas pas mtshon rnon po thogs te /🔽ba lang bsad cing bag bzhir gshags te /
analyzed: ba lang gi shen pa'i mchan bu mkhas pas mtshon rnon po thogs te / ba lang bsad cing bag bzhir gshags te /
translated: or the apprentice of a butcher, having taken up a sharp knife,🔽kills a cow and, having killed it, divides it into four parts.

original: de ltar so sor phye nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste /
analyzed: de ltar so sor phye nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste /
translated: Having divided it into four parts, he stands or sits🔽and examines it.

original: de la rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: de la rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du /
translated: In the same way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang /🔽lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang / lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do //
translated: practicing the perfection of wisdom🔽examines the body, thinking, “In this body there is the earth element,

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste /
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste /
translated: there is the water element, there is the fire element, and there is the wind element.”

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Subhūti, in that way a bodhisattva great being

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: practicing the perfection of wisdom🔽stands or sits

original: 'greng ngam 'dug ste /
analyzed: 'greng ngam 'dug ste /
translated: and examines

original: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /🔽brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa /
translated: They watch over their own bodies, but without objectifying anything.

original: @251b dran pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: @251b dran pa dang ldan pas /
translated: They are diligent, mindful, and aware.

original: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //
translated: They are free from worldly attachment and depression, and they practice.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad /
translated: practice the perfection of wisdom,🔽they contemplate this very body, from the soles of the feet

original: skra dang klad pa man chad du sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa yan chad du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste /
analyzed: skra dang klad pa man chad du sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa yan chad du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste /
translated: up to the hair and skin, as being filled with various impurities.

original: lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang /
analyzed: lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang /
translated: lungs, spleen, intestines, mesentery, undigested food, feces, tears, grease, spit, mucus, pus,🔽blood, synovial fluid, bile, phlegm, lymph, urine, semen, and brain, and there are also the brain stem and the membranes covering the brain.🔽He or she should thoroughly and correctly investigate, as they actually are, the facts about the head hairs, body hairs, nails, teeth, skin, flesh, sinews, bones, bone marrow, kidneys, heart, liver,🔽lungs, spleen, intestines, mesentery, undigested food, feces, tears, grease, spit, mucus, pus,

original: glo ba dang / mtsher pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rdul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang /🔽mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / rdu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste /
analyzed: glo ba dang / mtsher pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rdul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / rdu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste /
translated: blood, synovial fluid, bile, phlegm, lymph, urine, semen, and brain, and the brain stem and the membranes covering the brain.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / chun pa'i sgye snod til dang / yungs kar dang sran chung dang / bal sran dang / nas dang / gro dang / 'bras dang / 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba mig dang ldan pa'i mi zhig gis phye ste /🔽bltas na 'di ni til lo //🔽'di ni yungs kar ro //🔽'di ni sran chung ngo //🔽'di ni bal sran no //🔽'di ni nas @252a *//🔽so // 'di ni gro'o //🔽'di ni 'bras so //
analyzed: dper na / chun pa'i sgye snod til dang / yungs kar dang sran chung dang / bal sran dang / nas dang / gro dang / 'bras dang / 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba mig dang ldan pa'i mi zhig gis phye ste / bltas na 'di ni til lo // 'di ni yungs kar ro // 'di ni sran chung ngo // 'di ni bal sran no // 'di ni nas @252a *// so // 'di ni gro'o // 'di ni 'bras so //
translated: For example, a man with good eyesight, having opened a bag full of various grains such as sesame, mustard seed, rice, and wheat,🔽would know that “this is sesame, this is mustard seed, this is rice, this is wheat,”

original: 'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //🔽rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad /
analyzed: 'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so // rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad /
translated: and so on.🔽In the same way, Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being, having contemplated this very body from the soles of the feet on up and from the top of the head on down,

original: skra dang / spyi bo man chad sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa yan chad du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste /
analyzed: skra dang / spyi bo man chad sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa yan chad du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste /
translated: full of various impurities,🔽knows it to be just as it is.

original: lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang /🔽glo ba dang / mtshor pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rdul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang /
analyzed: lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mtshor pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rdul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang /
translated: In this body there are head hairs, body hairs, nails, teeth, skin, fat, flesh, bones, marrow, blood, lymph, veins, arteries, heart, liver, pleura, spleen, lungs, kidneys, stomach, intestines, mesentery, feces, urine, tears, sweat, mucus, phlegm, pus,🔽bile, lymph, saliva, dirt, brain, meninges, earwax, and nasal mucus.🔽He perfectly understands as it really is: ‘In this body there are head hairs, body hairs, nails, teeth, skin, fat, flesh, bones, marrow, blood, lymph, veins, arteries, heart, liver, pleura, spleen,🔽lungs, kidneys, stomach, intestines, mesentery, feces, urine, tears, sweat, mucus, phlegm, pus,

original: mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / rdu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go ///
analyzed: mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / rdu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go ///
translated: bile, lymph, saliva, dirt, brain, meninges, earwax, and nasal mucus.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po drug cu rtsa bzhi pa //
analyzed: bam po drug cu rtsa bzhi pa //

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

original: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
analyzed: nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /

analyzed: brtson 'grus can @252b shes bzhin dang ldan pa /

original: dran pa dang ldan pas /

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do //

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

analyzed: nam dur khrod na yod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs / dur khrod du bor ba /
translated: see various forms in a charnel ground,🔽thrown out in a charnel ground,

analyzed: shi nas zhag gcig lon pa'am /

analyzed: shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa'am /

original: shi nas zhag lnga lon pa'am /
analyzed: shi nas zhag lnga lon pa'am /
